tweets.tweet_raw: As much as #SoulStation is rooted in the past, I wanted our music to also live in the present. “I, Oh I” shows what can grow from those deep roots. tweets.tweet_raw: RIP MICHAEL STANLEY... No relation to me, was a Cleveland legend. A musician & songwriter who could pack arenas. He then transitioned into a radio personality. A bright light & warm soul. His letter to his fans before his death says it all. Such grace. https://t.co/GFRBwQjDqh
tweets.tweet: rip michael stanley... no relation to me, was a cleveland legend. a musician & songwriter who could pack arenas. he then transitioned into a radio personality. a bright light & warm soul. his letter to his fans before his death says it all. such grace.

tweets.tweet_raw: One of my closest friends Dell Furano has died after battling years of health struggles. He fought to the end because he loved his wife, family & friends. He valued life & lived it to the fullest. My love & support to Kym and his entire wonderful family. https://t.co/LxOowfXUsY

tweets.tweet_raw: Things work out out as they’re meant to. Many years ago I lost touch with Kelsey Grammer, who I shared a strong connection with. I missed him & couldn’t figure it out. I agreed to co-host @TheTalkCBS & turns out Kelsey is a guest! So glad to reconnect & pick up where we left off.
tweets.tweet: things work out out as they’re meant to. many years ago i lost touch with kelsey grammer, who i shared a strong connection with. i missed him & couldn’t figure it out. i agreed to co-host  & turns out kelsey is a guest! so glad to reconnect & pick up where we left off.

tweets.tweet_raw: Thanksgiving is tomorrow.Put aside the historical mythology & this day can have great meaning. What do you have to be thankful for? Who are you helping have a better life? I’m blessed with my  health, my family, true friends & you. Find your reasons for an attitude of gratitude.
